trans-unit.note: Currently selected slide number read by screen reader

trans-unit.source: See current balance, pending transactions, and history of confirmed transactions for BSQ address .
See all BSQ transactions in Bitcoin block (block hash ).
See a list of recent Bitcoin blocks with BSQ transactions, total BSQ sent per block, and more.
Explore the full Bitcoin ecosystem with The Mempool Open Source Project™. See Bisq market prices, trading activity, and more.
See price history, current buy/sell offers, and latest trades for the market on Bisq.
See high-level stats on the BSQ economy: supply metrics, number of addresses, BSQ price, market cap, and more.
See inputs, outputs, transaction type, burnt amount, and more for transaction with txid .
See recent BSQ transactions: amount, txid, associated Bitcoin block, transaction type, and more.
Our mempool and blockchain explorer for the Bitcoin community, focusing on the transaction fee market and multi-layer ecosystem, completely self-hosted without any trusted third-parties.
trans-unit.target: Наш експлорер мемпулу та блоків для ком'юніті Bitcoin з фокусом на ринок транзакцій та багаторівневу екосистему, повністю самостійний без жодних інтеграцій з довіреними третіми сторонами.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about The Mempool Open Source Project®: enterprise sponsors, individual sponsors, integrations, who contributes, FOSS licensing, and more.
See mempool transactions, confirmed transactions, balance, and more for address .

trans-unit.source: There many transactions on this address, more than your backend can handle. See more on setting up a stronger backend. Consider viewing this address on the official Mempool website instead:
trans-unit.target: На цій адресі більше транзакцій, ніж може обробити ваш бекенд. Дізнайтеся більше про налаштування потужного бекенду. Ви також можете переглянути цю адресу на офіційному вебсайті Mempool:

trans-unit.source: See Bitcoin feerates visualized over time, including minimum and maximum feerates per block along with feerates at various percentiles.
See the average mining fees earned per Bitcoin block visualized in BTC and USD over time.

See Bitcoin block health visualized over time. Block health is a measure of how many expected transactions were included in an actual mined block. Expected transactions are determined using Mempool's re-implementation of Bitcoin Core's transaction selection algorithm.
No data to display yet. Try again later.
trans-unit.target: Поки що немає даних для відображення. Спробуйте пізніше.

trans-unit.source: See Bitcoin block rewards in BTC and USD visualized over time. Block rewards are the total funds miners earn from the block subsidy and fees.
See Bitcoin block sizes (MB) and block weights (weight units) visualized over time.
See size, weight, fee range, included transactions, and more for Liquid block ().
See size, weight, fee range, included transactions, audit (expected v actual), and more for Bitcoin block ().
This block does not belong to the main chain, it has been replaced by:
Based on average native segwit transaction of 140 vBytes
trans-unit.target: На основі середнього розміру segwit транзакції в 140 vByte

trans-unit.note: Total subsidy and fees in a block

trans-unit.source: See the most recent Liquid blocks along with basic stats such as block height, block size, and more.
See the most recent Bitcoin blocks along with basic stats such as block height, block reward, block size, and more.
Either 2x the minimum, or the Low Priority rate (whichever is lower)
trans-unit.target: Або 2x мініуму, або повільна ставка (що менше)

trans-unit.source: Usually places your transaction in between the second and third mempool blocks
trans-unit.target: Зазвичай розміщує вашу транзакцію між другим та третім блоками мемпулу

trans-unit.source: Usually places your transaction in between the first and second mempool blocks
trans-unit.target: Зазвичай розміщує вашу транзакцію між першим та другим блоками мемпулу

trans-unit.source: Places your transaction in the first mempool block
trans-unit.target: Розмістить вашу транзакцію в першому блоці мемпулу

trans-unit.source: See hashrate and difficulty for the Bitcoin network visualized over time.
See stats for transactions in the mempool: fee range, aggregate size, and more. Mempool blocks are updated in real-time as the network receives new transactions.
Get real-time Bitcoin mining stats like hashrate, difficulty adjustment, block rewards, pool dominance, and more.
The overall luck of all mining pools over the past week. A luck bigger than 100% means the average block time for the current epoch is less than 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Загальна удача всіх майнінг-пулів за минулий тиждень. Успіх, більший за 100%, означає, що середній час блоків для поточної епохи менше 10 хвилин.

trans-unit.source: How many unique pools found at least one block over the past week.
trans-unit.target: Скільки унікальних пулів знайшли хоча б один блок за останній тиждень.

trans-unit.source: The number of blocks found over the past week.
trans-unit.target: Кількість блоків, знайдених за останній тиждень.

trans-unit.source: See the top Bitcoin mining pools ranked by number of blocks mined, over your desired timeframe.
See mining pool stats for : most recent mined blocks, hashrate over time, total block reward to date, known coinbase addresses, and more.
Broadcast a transaction to the network using the transaction's hash.

trans-unit.source: See mempool size (in MvB) and transactions per second (in vB/s) visualized over time.
See Bitcoin blocks and mempool congestion in real-time in a simplified format perfect for a TV.
Get real-time status, addresses, fees, script info, and more for transaction with txid {txid}.
This transaction has been replaced by:

trans-unit.note: Transaction ETA in several hours or more

trans-unit.source: Waiting for it to appear in the mempool...
Show more inputs to reveal fee data
trans-unit.target: Показати більше входів, щоб порахувати комісію

trans-unit.source: This transaction saved % on fees by using native SegWit
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція зекономила % на комісії використовуючи нативний SegWit

trans-unit.source: This transaction saved % on fees by using SegWit and could save % more by fully upgrading to native SegWit
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція зекономила % використовуючи SegWit і могла б зекономити % якщо б вона використовувала нативний SegWit

trans-unit.source: This transaction could save % on fees by upgrading to native SegWit or % by upgrading to SegWit-P2SH
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція могла зекономити % на комісії якщо б вона використовувала нативний SegWit або % якщо б вона використовувала SegWit-P2SH

trans-unit.source: This transaction uses Taproot and thereby saved at least % on fees
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція використовує Taproot і тому зекономила як мініум % на комісії
trans-unit.note: Tooltip about fees saved with taproot

trans-unit.source: This transaction uses Taproot and already saved at least % on fees, but could save an additional % by fully using Taproot
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція використовує Taproot і вже зекономила як мініум % на комісії, але могла б зекономити додаткові % повністю перейшовши на Taproot
trans-unit.note: Tooltip about fees that saved and could be saved with taproot

trans-unit.source: This transaction could save % on fees by using Taproot
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція могла зекономити % на комісії використавши Taproot
trans-unit.note: Tooltip about fees that could be saved with taproot

trans-unit.source: This transaction does not use Taproot
This transaction supports Replace-By-Fee (RBF) allowing fee bumping
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція підтримує Replace-By-Fee (RBF), що дозволяє збільшення комісії

trans-unit.source: This transaction does NOT support Replace-By-Fee (RBF) and cannot be fee bumped using this method
trans-unit.target: Ця транзакція НЕ підтримуює Replace-By-Fee (RBF) і не може бути замінена більшою комісією використовуючи цей метод

trans-unit.source: Only ~ sat/vB was needed to get into this block
trans-unit.target: Потрібно було всього ~ sat/vB щоб попасти до цього блоку

trans-unit.source: mempool.space merely provides data about the Bitcoin network. It cannot help you with retrieving funds, wallet issues, etc.For any such requests, you need to get in touch with the entity that helped make the transaction (wallet software, exchange company, etc).

Default push: action: 'want', data: ['blocks', ...] to express what you want pushed. Available: blocks, mempool-blocks, live-2h-chart, and stats.Push transactions related to address: 'track-address': '3PbJ...bF9B' to receive all new transactions containing that address as input or output. Returns an array of transactions. address-transactions for new mempool transactions, and block-transactions for new block confirmed transactions.
trans-unit.target: Надсилання за замовчуванням за замовчуванням: action: 'want', data: ['blocks', ...] щоб вказати, що має бути надіслано. Доступно: blocks, mempool-blocks, live-2h-chart та stats.Надіслати транзакції пов'язані з адресою: 'track-address': '3PbJ...bF9B' щоб отримати всі нові транзакції які містять дану адресу у входах чи виходах. Повертає масив транзакцій. address-transactions для нових мемпул транзакцій та block-transactions для нових підтверджених транзакцій.

trans-unit.source: Get answers to common questions like: What is a mempool? Why isn't my transaction confirming? How can I run my own instance of The Mempool Open Source Project? And more.
Documentation for the liquid.network REST API service: get info on addresses, transactions, assets, blocks, and more.
Documentation for the bisq.markets REST API service: get info on recent trades, current offers, transactions, network state, and more.
Documentation for the mempool.space REST API service: get info on addresses, transactions, blocks, fees, mining, the Lightning network, and more.
Documentation for the liquid.network WebSocket API service: get real-time info on blocks, mempools, transactions, addresses, and more.
Documentation for the mempool.space WebSocket API service: get real-time info on blocks, mempools, transactions, addresses, and more.
Documentation for our Electrum RPC interface: get instant, convenient, and reliable access to an Esplora instance.
This channel supports zero base fee routing
trans-unit.target: Цей канал підтримує маршрутизацію з нульовою базовою комісією

trans-unit.source: This channel does not support zero base fee routing
trans-unit.target: Цей канал не підтримує маршрутизацію з нульовою базовою комісією

trans-unit.source: Overview for Lightning channel . See channel capacity, the Lightning nodes involved, related on-chain transactions, and more.
The average fee rate charged by routing nodes, ignoring fee rates > 0.5% or 5000ppm

trans-unit.source: The average base fee charged by routing nodes, ignoring base fees > 5000ppm
trans-unit.target: Середня комісія, що стягується нодами маршрутизації, без урахування комісії > 5000ppm

trans-unit.source: The median fee rate charged by routing nodes, ignoring fee rates > 0.5% or 5000ppm
trans-unit.target: Медіана ставки комісії яка стягується нодами маршрутизації, без урахування ставки комісії > 0.5% чи 5000ppm

trans-unit.source: The median base fee charged by routing nodes, ignoring base fees > 5000ppm
trans-unit.target: Медіана базової комісії, що стягується нодами маршрутизації, без урахування базової комісії > 5000ppm

trans-unit.source: Get stats on the Lightning network (aggregate capacity, connectivity, etc) and Lightning nodes (channels, liquidity, etc) and Lightning channels (status, fees, etc).
Overview for the Lightning network node named . See channels, capacity, location, fee stats, and more.
See the channels of non-Tor Lightning network nodes visualized on a world map. Hover/tap on points on the map for node names and details.
See the locations of non-Tor Lightning network nodes visualized on a world map. Hover/tap on points on the map for node names and details.
See the number of Lightning network nodes visualized over time by network: clearnet only (IPv4, IPv6), darknet (Tor, I2p, cjdns), and both.
See a geographical breakdown of the Lightning network: how many Lightning nodes are hosted in countries around the world, aggregate BTC capacity for each country, and more.
Explore all the Lightning nodes hosted in and see an overview of each node's capacity, number of open channels, and more.
How much liquidity is running on nodes advertising at least one clearnet IP address

trans-unit.source: How much liquidity is running on nodes which ISP was not identifiable
trans-unit.target: Скільки ліквідності доступно на нодах, чий ISP неможливо ідентифікувати

trans-unit.source: How much liquidity is running on nodes advertising only Tor addresses
trans-unit.target: Скільки ліквідності доступно на нодах, що доступні тільки через Tor адресу
Топ 100 ISP провайдерів, які надають послуги хостингу LN нод

See the oldest nodes on the Lightning network along with their capacity, number of channels, location, etc.
See Lightning nodes with the most BTC liquidity deployed along with high-level stats like number of open channels, location, node age, and more.
See Lightning nodes with the most channels open along with high-level stats like total node capacity, node age, and more.
See top the Lightning network nodes ranked by liquidity, connectivity, and age.
See the capacity of the Lightning network visualized over time in terms of the number of open channels and total bitcoin capacity.
